rules_text: [i]Penance[/i] – {1}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Ceremonial Ox: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three target creatures you control.
flavor_text: [i]When an ox is sacrificed, no part goes unused. The fur is stitched into clothing, the meat is boiled into stew, and the bones are ground into herbal remedies.[/i]
